title: Trump says he hasn’t seen COVID-positive national security adviser Robert O'Brien
description: O’Brien is the highest ranking White House official yet to contract the coronavirus, and is now working remotely while he experiences mild symptoms.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Rep. John Lewis becomes the first Black lawmaker to lie in state
description: Following a funeral procession that passed notable Washington landmarks that carry personal significance to the civil rights icon, a military honor guard carried Congressman John Lewis’ flag-draped coffin into the Capitol Rotunda.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Florida surpasses New York in total coronavirus cases as death toll mounts nationwide
description: 40 states are seeing a rise in coronavirus cases, fueled by a disregard of social distancing guidelines, experts say. More national retailers, including office supply store Staples, are now requiring masks inside stores.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Moderna begins Phase 3 human trials for coronavirus vaccine, recruiting 30,000 volunteers
description: Half of the volunteers will receive the vaccine and half will receive a placebo. Moderna has received nearly $1 billion in federal funding and promises to produce 500 million doses per year. Other companies are expected to progress to late stage trials soon.
source.name: NBC News

author: Ben Popken
title: Pharma execs are getting multimillion-dollar payouts — without even producing a vaccine
description: Moderna, Novavax and Vaxart compensation plans allow executives and investors to receive payouts even before developing any successful coronavirus treatment.
content: Executives at pharmaceutical firms tasked with developing lifesaving drugs for the coronavirus and receiving billions of dollars in federal funding are taking home multimillion-dollar compensation pa… [+5363 chars]
source.name: NBC News

author: Erik Ortiz
title: Ivanka Trump accused of 'cheap' stunt for call to solve Native American cold cases
description: Ivanka Trump announced the nation's first Indian Affairs task force office in Minnesota dedicated to solving cold cases of missing and murdered Native Americans.
content: Pledging to bring justice for Native American families afflicted by higher rates of violence, homicide and human trafficking, Ivanka Trump announced the opening Monday in Minnesota of the nation's fi… [+7992 chars]
source.name: NBC News

author: Adam Edelman
title: Biden demands Trump let coronavirus vaccine process happen 'free of political pressure'
description: Biden released a three-rule template he said the president should follow as scientists rush to develop a vaccine.
content: Joe Biden on Monday said President Donald Trump must allow the coronavirus vaccine development process to play out free of political pressure and called on the president to adhere to three rules as s… [+2975 chars]

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden pays respects to Rep. John Lewis
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden and his wife Dr. Jill Biden paid their respects to the late Rep. John Lewis in the rotunda of the U.S. Capitol.
source.name: NBC News
